item.title: Wakhidatik add a quote by Sapardi Djoko Damono
Wakhidatik add a quote by Khrisna Pabichara
item.description: "Cinta yg bersyarat akan memudar tatkala syarat itu tak terpenuhi." -- Khrisna Pabichara

item.title: Wakhidatik add a quote by Khrisna Pabichara
item.description: "Aku ceritakan kesedihanku kepada sungai agar sungai mengajariku bagaimana mengalir tanpa sedikitpun mengeluh." -- Khrisna Pabichara

item.title: Wakhidatik add a quote by Richard Feynmann
item.description: "Study hard what interests you the most in the most undisciplined, irreverent and original manner possible." -- Richard Feynmann

item.title: Wakhidatik add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Wakhidatik add a quote by Richard P. Feynman
item.description: "Fall in love with some activity, and do it! Nobody ever figures out what life is all about, and it doesn't matter. Explore the world. Nearly everything is really interesting if you go into it deeply enough. Work as hard and as much as you want to on the things you like to do the best. Don't think about what you want to be, but what you want to do. Keep up some kind of a minimum with other things so that society doesn't stop you from doing anything at all." -- Richard P. Feynman

item.title: Wakhidatik add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "The more that you read, the more things you will know. The more that you learn, the more places you'll go." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Wakhidatik add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Any fool can know. The point is to understand." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Wakhidatik add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "It is not that I'm so smart. But I stay with the questions much longer." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Wakhidatik add a quote by C. JoyBell C.
item.description: "We have to allow ourselves to be loved by the people who really love us, the people who really matter. Too much of the time, we are blinded by our own pursuits of people to love us, people that don't even matter, while all that time we waste and the people who do love us have to stand on the sidewalk and watch us beg in the streets! It's time to put an end to this. It's time for us to let ourselves be loved." -- C. JoyBell C.

item.title: Wakhidatik add a quote by Bram Stoker
item.description: "We learn from failure, not from success!" -- Bram Stoker

item.title: Wakhidatik add a quote by Phil Collins
item.description: "In learning you will teach, and in teaching you will learn." -- Phil Collins

item.title: Wakhidatik add a quote by Eudora Welty
item.description: "Indeed, learning to write may be part of learning to read. For all I know, writing comes out of a superior devotion to reading." -- Eudora Welty
